name: AmeriCommerce

overview:
AmeriCommerce provides eCommerce plans to help businesses sell their products online.

AmeriCommerce revolutionizes the way ecommerce business is conducted with many industry firsts such as Multiple Storefronts management, One-Page Checkout, Facebook Store and a theme-able Mobile store. Our community driven model continually propels AmeriCommerce forward in the e-commerce software industry, giving our clients a feature set that no other software has, making AmeriCommerce the best online shopping cart software.

AmeriCommerceâ€™s hosted shopping cart software solution integrates with over 150 well-known brands like PayPal, Google, UPS, FedEx, QuickBooks, Peachtree, and more. AmeriCommerce offers ecommerce hosting, Website Design Packages, Merchant Services and Credit Card Processing Systems, Website Rollover Packages, SSL Certificates, Search Engine Optimization (SEO consulting), Online Store Setup Packages, and custom shopping cart packages to fit our customersâ€™ specifications.
